subject: Information about Your Kanda subscription through iwoca

rows.text: Thank you for subscribing to Kanda! We want to provide you with important information about how your subscription payments will be processed:

rows.subtext: Your payment will be managed by our partner, iwoca. You'll see a direct debit set up under their name.
Your first payment will be taken in 30 days. After that, payments will be automatically processed on the same day of each month.
Your subscription will run for 12 months, with payments stopping automatically after 12 installments.

rows.text: If you have any questions about your payments or subscription, feel free to reach out to our support team at help@kanda.co.uk..
